Card Description: Just keep doing what we're doing. Live today as we lived yesterday... until we can't.
Public transit uses scale to reduce emissions. By taking cars off the road, you reduce city traffic and air pollution.
Current food production pollutes our planet. Food-chain emissions could drop 70% if we eat vegan, 63% for vegetarian.
The food we waste is responsible for roughly 8% of ALL our global emissions.
Properly recycle A/C units. Refrigeration chemicals are 1000x more powerful than CO2 at warming the planet.
Stop logging virgin forests for toilet paper. Bamboo is faster growing and produces softer hygiene products.
Repurpose trash to make furniture. Making new products from old ones takes less energy and materials.
Depolarize climate, and vote for politicians who share your values, creating climate positive policies.
Use social media and personal influence to make climate cool again
Unite places of worship around climate change to protect creation and those in poverty who are most affected.
Educate girls to participate in local economies, strengthen families, and fight climate change.
Better align the location of housing, jobs and services to reduce driving and lower the cost of living.
Create combined day care centers for elders and children, reconnect generations and use fewer resources.
With our current lifestyle, the more people on the planet, the more resources we use and the more carbon is released.
Bring back the woolly mammoth to keep permafrost methane frozen in place.
Band together with your neighbors to share the costs and benefits of solar.
Sign up for the renewable energy program through your electric utility.
Diversify your land use and your income with wind energy.
Invest in projects that mitigate the carbon released through other activities, like flying.
Restore forests in your area with native species. Trees breathe CO2 and exhale oxygen.
Create a global online school to educate everyone on how to care for themselves, their families, and the planet.
Carbon emissions drop 50-95% using electric vehicles compared to gasoline-powered vehicles.
Implement a global carbon tax on emissions. Economists can confirm, when something costs more, we use less of it.
Replace super greenhouse gases with natural alternatives that keep us AND the planet cool.
Travel and ship cargo with the sun instead of jet fuel.
Create a global energy grid with smart technology that is more efficient and is optimized for renewables.
Replace the great Pacific garbage patch with a floating forest of fast-growing, CO2-eating Bamboo.
Small-scale farms with complimentary species provide biofuels and food while taking CO2 out of the oceans.
Replace liquid fossil fuels with living fuels, renewable, from algea
Move your money to a bank that doesn't fund the fossil fuel industry
Move your 401K investments into funds that promote sustainable companies
Invest in startups with promising new solutions to combate climate change
Encourage and support your elected officials in making climate-positive policy
New technologies are being designed that suck the CO2 out of the air
Work with your colleauges to influence your company to be more climate-friendly
Sue the government to ensure they take necessary action so you have a liveable future
Why learn if your future is so unsure? Leave school each month to talk to elected officials or take action
